nodes.text: Gabdor was a wet terrestrial world. It was the homeworld of Quiggold, the Gabdorin first mate of the pirate captain Sidon Ithano's crew.

Gabdor was first mentioned, albeit indirectly, in the short story "The Crimson Corsair and the Lost Treasure of Count Dooku," written by Landry Q. Walker and published in 2015. Its name was first given as Gabdor in the 2019 reference book Ultimate Star Wars, New Edition.
